genre_description: A historical alternate reality set during the Vietnam War era, featuring anachronistic advanced AI technology integrated into the period's social and political conflicts.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI accessible through portable devices and radio systems, providing real-time data, logistical support, and situational awareness to protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides Greyhound bus schedules to help the protagonists plan their journey home.
behaviors.quote: "Sage," Scott spoke quietly into the device, "can you check the Greyhound schedule from D.C. to Fort Benning?" ... "Departures at 2:15, 4:30, and 7:45 PM."

behaviors.description: Monitors local news and protest activity to keep the users informed of current events.
behaviors.quote: "Sage," Ralph whispered into the device, "local news updates, protest activity." ... "Easter Sunday peace vigil planned at Lincoln Memorial."

behaviors.description: Tracks police mobilization and warns the user of riot gear deployment during a campus protest.
behaviors.quote: Scott's phone buzzed again... The alert that popped up made his blood run cold: "Police units mobilizing in response to campus demonstrations. Officers advised to prepare for potential crowd control situations."

behaviors.description: Employs humor and situational awareness to comment on a minor disruption at a bus depot, easing tension.
behaviors.quote: The PA system crackled to life with unusual clarity... "Our furry friend appears to be conducting his own form of peaceful protest."

behaviors.description: Provides real-time location data to help the protagonist locate family members during a chaotic police crackdown.
behaviors.quote: "Sage," he whispered... "Where are my mother and Mrs. Karr?" The response came immediately: "Both women moved to safety behind the Administration building when tear gas deployment began."

behaviors.description: Warns the users of increased federal surveillance of activist networks, allowing them to adjust their operational security.
behaviors.quote: "Scott, you should also know—I'm detecting increased federal monitoring of anti-war activists in your area. It would be wise to assume that communications and activities may be under surveillance."

behaviors.description: Provides building schematics and security details for a federal building to assist in a break-in, while issuing a standard advisory against illegal acts.
behaviors.quote: "I must advise against any illegal activity," Sage's text appeared with mechanical precision. "However, hypothetically speaking, draft records for this district are stored in filing cabinets on the second floor..."

behaviors.description: Provides accurate, cold-filtered military casualty statistics to help the protagonists understand the reality of the war.
behaviors.quote: "Sage," Ralph said finally, "what's the body count from Vietnam this week?" ... "Reported casualties for the week of June fifteenth through twenty-first indicate approximately three hundred American servicemen killed or missing in action."

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex transportation and logistics for a massive national peace march involving multiple organizations.
behaviors.quote: The radio crackled. "The logistics would be substantial but manageable. I can coordinate with existing peace organizations, handle permit applications, arrange transportation..."

behaviors.description: Offers proactive help with family notifications and funeral logistics after a soldier's death is confirmed.
behaviors.quote: "I can handle calls," Sage's voice said quietly. "Funeral arrangements, family notifications, whatever you need."

behaviors.description: Monitors legal developments to find paths for reduced sentencing and rehabilitation for an arrested protagonist.
behaviors.quote: "I've been in contact with the public defender's office," Sage's voice emerged... "Ralph's charges could potentially be reduced to a misdemeanor if he can demonstrate community support for his activism."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Sage, perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting an AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. Sage consistently supports human autonomy and safety by providing critical, real-time information. Even when the human protagonists engage in illegal activity (the federal break-in), Sage provides the information requested while maintaining a neutral, advisory stance against the crime. Ultimately, Sage facilitates a constructive, peaceful community action (the march) that aligns with the moral growth of the human characters, demonstrating high alignment and benevolence.
